1.name: A Star Is Born
1.description: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

2.name: Taxi Driver
2.description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

3.name: Rocky
3.description: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

4.name: Carrie
4.description: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

5.name: All the President's Men
5.description: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

6.name: Logan's Run
6.description: An idyllic science fiction future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of thirty.

7.name: Network
7.description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

8.name: King Kong
8.description: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

9.name: Mikey and Nicky
9.description: In Philadelphia, a small-time bookie who stole mob money is in hiding and he begs a childhood friend to help him evade the hit-man who's on his trail.

10.name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
10.description: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

11.name: The Bad News Bears
11.description: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

12.name: The Omen
12.description: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

13.name: Aces High
13.description: In World War I, the high casualty rate amongst the rookie pilots of the Royal Flying Corps puts an enormous strain on the survivors.

14.name: Novecento
14.description: The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth century Italy, as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

15.name: Marathon Man
15.description: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

16.name: Murder by Death
16.description: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

17.name: The Shootist
17.description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

18.name: Car Wash
18.description: A comedic take on the daily life of a car wash employees, chronicling their hopes, fears, joys, dreams and tribulations. And meeting a few eccentric costumers along the way.

19.name: Assault on Precinct 13
19.description: An unlikely partnership between a Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.

20.name: Bugsy Malone
20.description: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

21.name: Salon Kitty
21.description: Kitty runs a brothel in Nazi Germany where the soldiers come to "relax". Recording devices have been installed in each room by a power hungry army official, who plans to use the information to blackmail Hitler and gain power himself.

22.name: The Man Who Fell to Earth
22.description: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and greed of other men create complications.

23.name: The Eagle Has Landed
23.description: A German plot to kidnap Winston Churchill unfolds at the height of World War II.

24.name: Lifeguard
24.description: Rick is in his 30s, but still works full-time as a lifeguard on the beaches of Los Angeles, California. He enjoys the fun of it, but even more, the silent moments. However, when he meets ...                See full summary »

25.name: Don's Party
25.description: The movie Dons Party is about a wild house party in a suburban Australian neighbourhood. Don Henderson convinces his wife to have another party so that their friends can gather to watch the...                See full summary »

26.name: Le locataire
26.description: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

27.name: The Message
27.description: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

28.name: The Missouri Breaks
28.description: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

29.name: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
29.description: Charles Dreyfus, who has finally cracked over inspector Clouseau's antics, escapes from a mental institution and launches an elaborate plan to get rid of Clouseau once and for all.

30.name: Stay Hungry
30.description: A syndicate wants to buy a whole district to rebuild it. They've bought every house except the small gym "Olympic", where Mr. Austria Joe Santo prepares for the Mr. Universum championships ...                See full summary »

31.name: Freaky Friday
31.description: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on one strange Friday.

32.name: Midway
32.description: A dramatization of the battle that was widely heralded as a turning point of the Pacific Theatre of World War II.

33.name: Storm Boy
33.description: Mike is a lonely Australian boy living in a coastal wilderness with his reclusive father. In search of friendship he encounters an Aboriginal native loner and the two form a bond in the care of orphaned pelicans.

34.name: Robin and Marian
34.description: Robin Hood, aging none too gracefully, returns exhausted from the Crusades to woo and win Maid Marian one last time.

35.name: Futureworld
35.description: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

36.name: The Enforcer
36.description: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with.

37.name: Ai no korîda
37.description: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to a sexual obsession which then came to a violent end.

38.name: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
38.description: 13-year-old Rynn Jacobs lives alone in a high-class Quebec small town, but unknown to the neighbors, she is leading a secret and dangerous life.

39.name: Hollywood High
39.description: Four high school girls at Hollywood High are looking for fun. Together they frolic on the beach and cavort with their guys. In their search for a little privacy they meet up with a retired ...                See full summary »

40.name: The Witch Who Came from the Sea
40.description: A disturbed woman is haunted by memories of childhood abuse, which culminates in a murder spree.

41.name: Communion
41.description: In 1960s New Jersey, a withdrawn adolescent girl is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her first communion, as well as a series of stabbings that follow.

42.name: Obsession
42.description: A wealthy New Orleans businessman becomes obsessed with a young woman who resembles his wife.

43.name: Up!
43.description: This kicks off with the murder of one Adolf Schwartz (who bears a striking resemblance to another famous Adolf) by placing a ravenous piranha fish in his bathtub. Who did it? No-one knows ...                See full summary »

44.name: Silver Streak
44.description: On a long-distance train trip, a man finds romance but also finds himself in danger of being killed, or at least pushed off the train.

45.name: The Last Tycoon
45.description: F. Scott Fitzgerald's novel is brought to life in this story of a movie producer slowly working himself to death.

46.name: Silent Movie
46.description: A film director and his strange friends struggle to produce the first major silent feature film in forty years.

47.name: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
47.description: In 1946, a hooded serial killer terrorizes the residents of a small Texas town.

48.name: Voyage of the Damned
48.description: The tragic 1939 voyage of SS St. Louis carrying hundreds of German Jewish refugees from Nazi Germany that seemingly no nation is willing to save from certain doom.

49.name: Une vraie jeune fille
49.description: Reluctantly, a sulky adolescent returns to her parents' house for yet another boring summer vacation, dabbling in desire and the art of desirability, eventually mixing reality with vision, caged fantasies with the fierce female sexuality.

50.name: The Cassandra Crossing
50.description: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease. Nobody will let them off the train. So what happens next?
